document_data.name: Mirabel
document_data.mainbody: '''Mirabel''' was a [[Red Wizard]] [[diviner]] and an ally of the [[Legion of the Chimera]] in the early 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Possessions: Mirabel wore an intricacy carved [[enchanted]] [[ivory]] [[Mirabel's pendant|cameo]] that depicted a bald woman's visage. Its backside was engraved with two letters of the [[Mulhorandi language]] â€“ "A.L."
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1312}}, Mirabel was sent to the [[Z'hinda Citadel]] underneath [[The Spine of the World]] by her masters to kill a [[Goblin slayers of Targos|group of mercenaries]] from [[Targos]]. Her Red Wizard masters were allied with the [[Legion of the Chimera]] and sought to stop the adventurers' advancement towards the secluded town of [[Kuldahar]]. However, Mirabel and her partner, [[Majrash]], both were killed by the heroes from Targos.
